item.title: Your dotfiles under control
item.description: Many developers throughout their career end up creating many scripts, aliases and customizations in their development environments. These settings are normally kept in files, and when this user changes their environment, they sometimes make a copy of these files to the new environment. This process tends to be done by copying your files from one environment to another. Although it works, there is a more practical way to manage these files, making the proper associations as needed, including supporting different profiles.
